description: Declines Amazon Macie membership invitations that were received from specific accounts.

nested_items.name: unprocessedAccounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each account whose invitation hasn't been declined. Each object identifies the account and explains why the request hasn't been processed for that account.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the account that the request applies to.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The source of the issue or delay in processing the request.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The reason why the request hasn't been processed.
